title: TREAT: Play & impact REAL dogs
description:
🐾 Welcome to TREAT - the game that lets you make a difference in the lives of real dogs! 🐾
TREAT is not just another app – it's an opportunity to play, connect, and positively impact the lives of real shelter dogs in need.

Select a real shelter dog in your area.
Play with your chosen dog to earn rewards such as FREE treats, which will be sent directly to them via Chewy.
Get notified when your dog finds a new home!

🎮 **Play with Purpose: Impact Real Lives**
Adopt virtual pets and play with them to earn rewards, treats and essential items that are sent to real rescue dogs. Your every action within the game resonates with care and kindness.

💌 **Send Real Love: Treats Delivered by Chewy**
As you progress through the game, you can send real treats, meals, and items to shelter dogs, which can be tracked through Chewy. Imagine the joy you'll bring to those wagging tails with every package you send!

🏠 **Stay Connected: Know Once Your Dog is Homed**
 when your dogs find their forever homes. Your journey with TREAT doesn't end with gameplay – it extends to creating brighter futures for these loving companions.

Ready to combine your love for gaming with your compassion for dogs? Download TREAT now and embark on a journey of play, impact, and connection. Every tap, every treat – it all matters. Let's play to make a difference! 🐶🎉
